name: Dungeon [Skull] Busters - Meet Ivory
description:
This game is a submission for Creative Cutscene Contest

Hosted by TeasJams, DriftwoodGaming · #@DriftwoodGaming

 https://itch.io/jam/c3 

Story - You are Red, leader of Dungeon [Skull] Busters, vigilante for search-seek-and-kill enemies (humans, monsters, demons, etc) every dungeons they seek....with rewards.

This is a cutscene where you meet the former member of the guild.....or team.
